plugins.name: 图形透视变换 Perspective Transform
plugins.description:
介绍

图形透视变换是一个强大的 Figma 插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您轻松实现矢量图形的透视变形。通过直观的界面和灵活的控制，您可以快速调整图形的四个角点，创造出专业级的设计效果。


功能说明

  1. 实时透视调整：通过拖动四个角点，实时调整矢量图形的透视效果。
  2. 精确控制：基于相对比例定位，确保变形的精准性和一致性。
  3. 自动更新：选择新的图形时，插件自动重新计算并定位角点。
  4. 重置功能：一键恢复图形到初始状态，方便反复调整。
  5. 兼容多种图形：支持矩形及简单的四边形矢量图形。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 中选择一个矩形或四边形矢量图形。
  2. 运行透视变换（专业版）插件。
  3. 在插件界面中，拖动四个角点以调整图形的透视效果。
  4. 点击“重置”按钮可将图形恢复到原始状态。
  5. 观察 Figma 中的图形实时更新，直至达到满意的设计效果。


注意事项

  1. 仅支持简单的四边形路径，复杂路径可能无法正确解析。
  2. 在使用插件前，建议备份原始图形以防止数据丢失。
  3. 插件当前版本不支持曲线或多路径的矢量图形。
  4. 确保 Figma 已更新到最新版本，以获得最佳使用体验。


Introduction

Perspective Transform Pro is a powerful Figma plugin designed for designers to effortlessly achieve perspective transformations on vector graphics. With an intuitive interface and flexible controls, you can quickly adjust the four corner points of your graphics to create professional-grade design effects.


Function Description

  1. Real-Time Perspective Adjustment: Manipulate the four corner points to adjust the perspective of vector graphics in real-time.
  2. Precise Control: Based on relative proportions, ensuring accuracy and consistency in transformations.
  3. Automatic Updates: Automatically recalculates and repositions corner points when selecting new graphics.
  4. Reset Functionality: One-click reset to restore graphics to their original state for easy adjustments.
  5. Compatibility with Various Shapes: Supports rectangles and simple quadrilateral vector graphics.


How to Use

  1. Select a rectangle or quadrilateral vector graphic in Figma.
  2. Run the Perspective Transform Pro plugin.
  3. In the plugin interface, drag the four corner points to adjust the perspective effect.
  4. Click the "Reset" button to restore the graphic to its original state.
  5. Observe the graphic in Figma updating in real-time until you achieve the desired design effect.


Precautions

  1. Supports only simple quadrilateral paths; complex paths may not parse correctly.
  2. It is recommended to backup original graphics before using the plugin to prevent data loss.
  3. The current version does not support curved or multi-path vector graphics.
  4. Ensure Figma is updated to the latest version for the best user experience.

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Advanced Perspective Transformation for Designers

plugins.name: Section Generator

Allows you to create a large number of sections all at once. This is a great way to organize a handoff file with each row for different functionality or features.


Main section

Each main section is a row with a cover tile. The cover tile will be titled with the name you give. Main sections are stacked vertically.


Subsections

Configure the number of subsections you want per row. Subsections are spaced horizontally.


-> Allows you to include any number of desktop (1440) and mobile (390) screens

-> Each screen has a notes field below it for your annotations

plugins.name: Lint copy
plugins.description:
Lint copy helps UX writers and content designers automatically enforce style rules with a custom word list.


Enforce things like plain language (e.g. detect "utilize" and suggest replacing it with "use"), the company's voice and tone (e.g. detect "we are" and suggest using the contraction), and even product terminology.


Create a custom word list in JSON and host it in a public GitHub repository to experience the plugin's full power.


The plugin also enforces sentence case and strings starting with a capital, neither of which is customizable.


For full details, read the documentation.
plugins.tagline: Check text layers against a word list to enforce style, voice, and terminology.

plugins.name: Text Harvest
plugins.description:
Text Harvest exports and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

Get a quick CSV file from your designs for your copywriting or localization team.


Export

  1. Make a selection or export the entire page if there's no selection
  2. The plugin export only the visible layers, and also ignore the duplicated ones
  3. You'll get a CSV file with layer names and its content
  4. You can skip text layers that you don't want to export by simply adding the symbol "!" at the beginning of the layer name


Update

  1. Make a selection or update the entire page if there's no selection
  2. Select the CSV file
  3. The plugin updates all the layers with the same name


Currently multicolumn CSV are not supported. If you need to translate to different languages, upload an independent CSV for each one
plugins.tagline: Export and updates text layers in bulk with a CSV file

plugins.name: another-data-populator
plugins.description:
Another Data Populator


A Figma plugin that populates your designs with JSON.


How it works


1. Create a Layer Group that contains at least one Text Layer. In the Text Layer content, use placeholders for you data fields in double curly brackets – such as {{firstname}} or {{lastname}}. The plugin will replace all these placeholders with respective data. _Please note that if your Text Layer is called {{name}} (in the Layer List), the content of the Layer will always be overwritten with the data contained in {{name}}. So if you use multiple {{placeholders}} in a Text Layer, you should rename your Layer to something without curly brackets._


2. In the same Layer Group, create a Shape Layer (this is your image placeholder). Give the Shape Layer a placeholder name in double curly brackets – such as {{image}}. The plugin will replace this placeholder with respective image data (PNG or JPG).


3. For JSON arrays, create a Layer Group with a placeholder name like {{items}}. That group must contain one child Group Layer with the name {{template}}. This is the group that will be cloned and populated with the JSON array data. This works recursively with nested data. The array placeholder can have an optional limit filter {{items | limit 5}}, which will limit the number of {{template}} clones.


Available Commands


Populate with Dummy JSON

The plugin includes presets from https://dummyjson.com/ including:


- Products

- Carts

- Recipes

- Users

- Posts

- Comments

- Todos

- Quotes


Populate with Imported JSON

You can also upload any JSON file from your machine.


Filters

By appending your {{placeholder}} with one of the following available filters, separated by a |, you can use certain operations on your populated strings.


1. Maximum characters

You can set the maximum number of characters of your {{placeholder}} by appending it with | max n, 'n' representing the desired number of characters.


{{name | max 3}}


2. Date

Display {{placeholder}} in MM/DD/YYYY format.


{{dateTimeString | date}}


Conditional Actions

A Conditional Action performs a certain action on a Layer Group or Component based on data and a conditional expression. The Conditional Action is controlled by the name of the Layer Group (or Component).


1. #show[condition]

shows layer if true and hides otherwise


2. #hide[condition]

hides layer if true and shows otherwise


2. #duplicate[condition]

duplicate layer n times


3. #variant[condition, component property]

set component property based on condition


Examples

#show[{{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} has more than 3 characters and hides otherwise


#show[{{firstname}} == "Peter"]

shows layer if {{firstname}} is 'Peter' and hides otherwise


#duplicate[{{rating}}]

duplicates the layer by the value of {{rating}}


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked]

sets the component property "Value Type" to "Checked" if {{completed}} is true


You can combine several conditions:


#show[{{firstname}}.includes('e') || {{firstname}}.length > 3]

shows layer if {{firstname}} includes 'e' or has more than 3 characters, hides otherwise


Or several Conditional Actions:


#variant[{{completed}}, Value Type = Checked] #variant[{{completed}}, State = Completed]

sets the component properties "Value Type" to "Checked" and "State" to "Completed" if {{completed}} is true


Pure JavaScript syntax is being used for Conditional Actions, so you can basically use anything available in JavaScript.
plugins.tagline: Populate your designs with JSON

plugins.name: 批量字号行高对齐
plugins.description:
## 🎯 核心功能

- **智能识别模式**：自动区分单行文本和段落文本，分别应用最适合的行高倍数

- **统一行高模式**：为所有选中文本应用相同的行高倍数，精确控制排版节奏

- **批量处理**：支持选中 Frame、Group 等容器，一键处理内部所有文本图层


## ✨ 使用场景

- 快速统一设计稿中的文字行高

- 优化阅读体验，单行标题紧凑，段落文本舒适

- 批量调整多个页面的文字排版


## 🔧 默认设置

- **单行文本**：1.0 倍（紧凑排版）

- **段落文本**：1.68 倍（黄金比例，舒适阅读）

- **支持自定义调整**：0.1–5 倍


## 🆕 更新日志 v2.0

- 新增智能识别功能，自动区分单行和段落文本

- 新增统一行高模式，满足不同设计需求

- 优化 UI 界面，操作更直观

- 支持自定义行高倍数（0.1–5 倍）

- 行高计算采用向下取整，确保像素完美对齐


---


## 🎯 Core Features

- **Smart Detection Mode**: Automatically distinguishes between single-line and paragraph text, applying the optimal line height multiplier for each.

- **Uniform Line Height Mode**: Applies the same line height multiplier to all selected text layers for precise typographic control.

- **Batch Processing**: Supports selection of Frames, Groups, and other containers to apply changes to all nested text layers in one click.


## ✨ Use Cases

- Quickly unify text line height across your design

- Improve readability: tighter single-line headings, more breathable paragraph spacing

- Batch-adjust text layouts across multiple pages

plugins.name: Change Variable Descriptions
plugins.description:
Tired of manually updating each Figma variable’s description? This plugin streamlines the process by allowing you to update all variable descriptions simultaneously using a CSV file. This means you can ensure your design system stays consistent and well-documented—without the hassle of repetitive edits.


How It Works:


•Prepare Your CSV: Create a CSV file with the format: token_name,description. Ensure each variable name in your CSV matches exactly (1:1) with the ones in Figma; the plugin is sensitive to misspellings and will skip any mismatches.

•Select Variable Collection(s): Choose one or multiple variable collections based on your CSV file. (Recommendation: create a separate CSV for each collection.)

•Preview Changes: Review the highlighted changes in a table before applying them, ensuring accuracy and control over the update process.

•Apply Updates: With just a few clicks, update all selected variable descriptions in your Figma design system.


Streamline your design documentation, avoid manual errors, and keep your design tokens up-to-date effortlessly!
plugins.tagline: Simplify workflow: Update variable descriptions in one click

plugins.name: Quick styles
plugins.description:
How does the plugin works:


Save a Style

1.Open the plugin library.

2.Select the layer you want to save styles from.

3.Click Save on one of the style slots in the plugin.

4.The style is saved!


Set a Shortcut

1.Open System Settings.

2.Navigate to Keyboard > Keyboard Shortcuts > App Shortcuts.

3.Click on the plus (+) icon.

4.Set the app to Figma in the menu.

5.Type the exact menu title name.

6.Set your shortcut and click Done!


Apply a Style

1.Select any layer.

2.Use the menu item or shortcut to apply styles!

plugins.name: Frame Flow
plugins.description:
The Figma plugin “Frame Flow” allows you to duplicate the selected frame to the right or below with a predefined spacing. In addition to duplication, it also lets you insert blank frames at custom intervals. It’s especially useful when creating presentation documents, as it helps you add pages smoothly without disrupting the layout spacing. Setting up keyboard shortcuts is highly recommended for efficient use.


New Frame

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size.


Add Frame Right

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size to the right of the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + → (Right Arrow)


Add Frame Below

Creates a new empty frame with the specified size below the currently selected frame.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Right

Duplicates the currently selected frame to the right.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + → (Right Arrow)


Duplicate Frame Below

Duplicates the currently selected frame below.

Recommended shortcut: ⌘ + ⌥ (Option) + ⇧ (Shift) + ↓ (Down Arrow)


Settings

Configure various parameters.




Figmaプラグイン「Frame Flow」は、選択中のフレームを、事前に設定した間隔で右隣や下に複製できるプラグインです。複製のみではなく、白紙のフレームを好きな間隔で配置することも可能です。主に資料作成時、ページの間隔を崩さずスムーズにページを増やしていきたい時に活躍します。ショートカットを設定するのがおすすめです。


New Frame

設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。


Add Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + →(右矢印)です。


Add Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、設定したサイズの空フレームを新規作成します。おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Right

いま選択しているフレームの右隣に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + →(右矢印)です。


Duplicate Frame Below

いま選択しているフレームの下に、フレームを複製します。

おすすめショートカットキーは⌘ + ⌥(option) + ⇧(shift) + ↓(下矢印)です。


Settings

様々な値を設定します。

plugins.name: Figma to Scabld
plugins.description:
Effortlessly Import Your Figma Designs into Scabld!


Transform your designs into mobile apps in no time with the Scabld plugin for Figma. Seamlessly bring your Figma screens into Scabld and move from design to a fully functional mobile app without any coding required. Our plugin automatically adapts your design to Scabld's no-code platform, so you can focus on turning your vision into reality.


How to use this plugin


1. Install the free Figma plugin.

2. Select your Figma designs.

3. Import them directly into Scabld.

4. Continue editing and customizing just like in Figma.

5. Add interactions and animations.

6. Finalize and publish your mobile app with zero code.


With Scabld, skip the hassle of manual conversions. Simply import your Figma files into our no-code platform and turn them into fully functional mobile apps. We preserve your layer names and design structure, making it easy to pick up where you left off and enhance your creations for a smooth user experience.


Preserve your layer structure.

When you import your designs, all your Figma groups and layer names are kept intact. This allows you to refine, adjust, and polish your app directly in Scabld without losing any important details.


Performance and optimization guaranteed.

When you publish with Scabld, we ensure your mobile app is optimized for peak performance across all devices. Every file is tuned for a fast and smooth experience, providing a high-quality result without compromising speed.


To learn more about Scabld and explore our other features, visit scabld.com.
plugins.tagline: Import your Figma designs into Scabld effortlessly.

plugins.name: TextSwapper
plugins.description:
Features


Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes in Figma.

Quickly update text without needing extra tools.

Streamlined text replacement for multiple objects, components, and frames.

Simple and intuitive interface for seamless integration with your workflow.

Save time ⏰ and eliminate the hassle of manually editing text in Figma!

How:


Add the word "page" to the name of your page frame (e.g., agreement_page).

Enter the text you want to replace in the "Find text" field (e.g., {company name}).

Enter the new text in the "Replace with" field (e.g., Figma).

Use the "Update" button to replace the specified line, or the "Update All" button to replace all occurrences of the text in your document.

Use the + and - buttons to adjust the number of text fields.

Click Save to store your list of text replacements for faster updates when working on the same document.

Use Load to retrieve your saved list of text replacements and automatically fill in the fields. The current version retrieves only the latest saved list.

Click Download Selected Pages as PDF to download the selected pages as one merged PDF file.
plugins.tagline: Easily customize text for legal contracts, sales proposals, and resumes—no extra tools needed.

plugins.name: md格式转设计稿 Markdown to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to convert Markdown text into fully structured Figma frames automatically, enhancing design workflows and documentation processes.


Function Description

The plugin parses Markdown syntax and creates corresponding Figma frames and text elements, supporting headings, lists, bold text, and horizontal rules. It ensures that all content is visually organized according to Markdown structuring.


Usage Method

Simply input your Markdown text into the provided text area in the plugin’s UI and click the ‘Convert Markdown’ button. The formatted content will appear as structured frames within your current Figma file.


Note

Ensure all text is properly formatted in Markdown before conversion. The frame width is fixed at 500px, but the height will adjust according to the content.


介绍

此插件允许用户将Markdown文本自动转换成完全结构化的Figma框架，增强设计工作流程和文档处理过程。


功能说明

插件解析Markdown语法，并创建相应的Figma框架和文本元素，支持标题、列表、加粗文本和水平规则。它确保所有内容都按照Markdown的结构进行视觉组织。


使用方法

只需在插件的用户界面中提供的文本区域中输入您的Markdown文本，然后点击“转换Markdown”按钮。格式化的内容将以结构化框架的形式出现在您当前的Figma文件中。


注意事项

确保在转换前所有文本都正确格式化为Markdown。框架宽度固定为500px，但高度将根据内容调整。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Transform Markdown into Structured Figma Frames

plugins.name: batchy
plugins.description:
batchy is a helper tool to make your exports more comfortable. Instead of just using the layer name and getting the layer size, you will now be able to write your own asset name dynamically with the help of export tokens and choosing between layer size or screen size for your assets.


Features

  1. dynamic asset names with several export tokens like: layers, date, file, scaling, index, user, top-level frame name,
  2. export assets in layer or screen size (top-level frame)
  3. export your current selection
  4. export from an asset list
  5. date formats for your naming
  6. export in common file formats like png, jpg, svg, pdf
  7. multiple files will be downloaded as a zip, single files will be downloaded as single files
  8. OS-proofed asset name support
plugins.tagline: Export your designs with dynamic name behaviors.

plugins.name: FlipArabic
plugins.description:
Flip frames, change fonts, and translate copy for Arabic layouts. All with one click.

Let FlipArabic handle localization so you can focus on crafting great experiences.


Made for Your Workflow

  1. Save Time - No hours wasted on manual mirroring or font hunting.
  2. Zero Learning Curve - Select a frame or whole sections for multiple frames and convert!
  3. No Details Lost - Padding, nested auto-layouts, absolute elements, and constraints are all taken care of.
  4. Built-in Translation - AI-powered translation that keeps copy in context (big updates coming in this space).
  5. Smart Font Swapping - Auto-matches weights & styles when exact alternatives aren't available.
  6. Smart Skip for Visuals - Icons, logos, shapes, SVGs & flags keep their original direction.


Fine Tune Your Conversion

  1. Add df or don't flip to layer names to skip flipping
  2. Add dfc or don't flip content to frame names to flip position but keep contents unchanged
  3. Add dt or don't translate to text layer names to keep specific text in English
  4. Add dtc or don't translate content to parent frame names to preserve entire text blocks


For support, ideas or general feedback, reach out to fliparabic@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs to Arabic instantly. Flip, change fonts & translate in one click.

plugins.name: Select by Style
plugins.description:
Select by Style makes it easy to find and select all elements on your page that share the same text or colour styling.


Perfect for designers who need to quickly audit styles, make bulk changes, or ensure consistency across their designs. Save time by selecting multiple elements at once instead of hunting them down individually.


What it does:

The plugin automatically scans your current page and organises all text styles and colour styles into easy-to-browse tables. Simply click on any style to instantly select all elements using that style across your page.


How to use it:

  1. Open the plugin to see all styles detected on your current page
  2. Browse the Text tab to see text styles with font details, sizes, and weights
  3. Browse the Colour tab to see colour styles with hex codes and opacity
  4. Use the search bar to quickly find specific styles by name, font, or colour
  5. Click any style row to select all elements using that style
  6. Use the Refresh button when you add new content to the page


Key features:

  1. Instant selection: Click once to select all elements with the same style
  2. Smart organisation: Separate tabs for text and colour styles with detailed information
  3. Search & filter: Quickly find styles by typing in the search box
  4. Library detection: See which styles are local vs. from external libraries
  5. Auto-refresh: Detects when you switch pages or add significant new content
  6. Live updates: Automatically updates when you change styles on selected elements


How are we doing? We're always working to make this plugin better and would genuinely appreciate hearing about your experience - and suggestions for enhancement.
plugins.tagline: Quickly select all elements using the same style
